LanguageData.kathanon.PrisonerUtil.SetOwnerPrisoner.d: Assign this bed to a specific prisoner.
LanguageData.kathanon.PrisonerUtil.ReservedForPrisone: Toggles if this is reserved for the use of prisoners.
LanguageData.kathanon.PrisonerUtil.InitModeStranger.d: When taking a stranger prisoner, they will initially be set to this prisoner interaction.
LanguageData.kathanon.PrisonerUtil.InitModeColonist.d: When taking a colonist prisoner, they will initially be set to this prisoner interaction.
LanguageData.kathanon.PrisonerUtil.InitModeSlave.desc: When taking a slave prisoner, they will initially be set to this prisoner interaction.
